## BTV Checklist

- [ ] **BUILD**: Frontmatter valid, links resolve, renders correctly
- [ ] **TEST**: Spelling passes, style guide compliance, cross-references intact
- [ ] **VALIDATE**: Brand compliance, template structure match

## Type of Change

- [ ] New document
- [ ] Update to existing document
- [ ] Template change
- [ ] Policy change (requires 2 approvals if compliance/security/data-governance)
- [ ] Workflow/process change
- [ ] Configuration change

## Review Notes

<!-- Any specific areas to focus review on -->

## Compliance

- [ ] No PHI/PII included
- [ ] No credentials or secrets
- [ ] HIPAA retention fields present (if compliance document)
- [ ] Control mappings updated (if policy document)
